attributes.additional_details:
For over 40 years there has been tireless campaigning to improve things for dyslexic children, and young adults while at school! But over this time very little has changed.

The consequences of this lack of support can have life long negative effects! Which could be completely avoidable with the appropriate help put in place!

Making all schools dyslexia friendly! Is the first major step forward to helping to alleviate this ongoing problem, faced by so many young dyslexic people today!
attributes.background:
A majority of dyslexic children, and young adults are still struggling within the education system!

Yet over recent years there has been clear evidence, that by making schools dyslexia friendly! Things have vastly improved for them, with noticeable decreases in academic failure.
